title: Convert string to kebabcase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to kebabcase

Kebabcase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with hyphens.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello-world"

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to kebabcase

Kebabcase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with hyphens.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello-world"
```
